title: Caribbean Health Foods
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Salad bar, Juice bar, Take-out, Caribbean, Trinidadian
description: Formerly known as College Health Foods. Shop and food service providing a range of cooked and raw foods, snacks and drinks, healthy and soy food products. Eat in or take away.
